subject: Horse Racing
organizations: New York State Racing and Wagering Board
Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals
lead_paragraph: The New York State Racking Board launched an investigation of the thoroughbred breeder and owner Ernie Paragallo and his treatment of horses at his farm.
snippet: The New York State Racking Board launched an investigation of the thoroughbred breeder and owner Ernie Paragallo and his treatment of horses at his farm.
